name: Overdoc
description:
Made for global game jam 2020, Theme - Repair

You play as a doctor in trying to help poisoned patients. You would need to gather materials in your lab and whip up antidotes for the patients before they die.

WASD keys to  move your character around the level.

J  key to interact (Interacting with tables, brewing station and the dispensary while holding onto an item for special action).

K key to throw held item.
